TelemetryActionRelatedProcess.name: TelemetryActionRelatedProcess
TelemetryActionRelatedProcess.description: Represents the relationship between a telemetry action and a process triggered by the action such as a service catalog item definition or a product.

Name.description: The name of the telemetry action related process.

RelatedProcessId.description: The process triggered by the action defined for a telemetry definition.

TelemetryActionDefinitionId.description: The action related to a telemetry definition.
